0:
--------------------
Text: Pity means feeling for others, particularly feelings of sadness or sorrow, and is used in a comparable sense to the more modern words "sympathy" and "empathy".
Triplets:<pity
1:
--------------------
Text: Pity:  Through insincere usage, it can also have a more unsympathetic connotation of feelings of superiority or condescension.
Triplets:<Pity
